Description: Ostracon, fragment from the upper-body of a red-brown pottery vessel, partly ribbed, the fabric is light-brown in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393842) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393842)
